# GRAPHICS::SET_CHECKPOINT_FORCE_OLD_ARROW_POINTING

## Summary
Forces a checkpoint that uses arrows to use the old style arrow pointing

## Parameters
* **CHECKPOINT_INDEX** uniqueCheckpoint
